subtitle: Produce premium product photos, ingredient visuals, and lifestyle scenes tailored to wellness and beauty audiences.

seo.title: AI Photography for Supplements and Beauty Brands | BoostUGC
seo.description: Learn how to generate premium supplement and beauty product images using AI, including lifestyle, hero, and ingredient visuals.

heroImage.prompt: Wellness-themed flat lay with dropper bottles, soft white fabric, eucalyptus leaves, and daylight shadows. Clean premium aesthetic. 1:1.

sections.heading: Why Supplements and Beauty Need Better Photos
sections.body: These categories depend heavily on trust and perceived quality. Clean visuals with natural props and soft lighting communicate safety, purity, and effectiveness.

sections.heading: Key Visual Styles That Perform
sections.body:
Wellness flat lays. Fabrics, botanicals, minimal props.

Ingredient close-ups. Pure, scientific, natural.

Bathroom rituals. Morning and evening routines.
sections.imagePrompt: Ingredient macro shot of natural botanical elements with bright white background. 1:1.
sections.imageAlt: Macro ingredient shot with clean background.

sections.heading: How AI Helps You Scale Beautiful Visuals
sections.body: AI allows you to produce consistent brand visuals across many SKUs without expensive photography or complex staging.
sections.imagePrompt: Dropper bottle on soft towel with warm natural window light. 1:1.
sections.imageAlt: Dropper bottle on towel with natural lighting.

sections.heading: Best Practices
sections.body:
• Use soft daylight.
  • Avoid clutter.
  • Stick to neutral or botanical props.
  • Show textures and ingredients clearly.

sections.heading: Final Takeaway
sections.body: AI photography gives supplement and beauty brands the ability to produce premium visuals consistently, affordably, and on demand.
